snippet: Tuesday’s highlights from around the Web include a 2010 profile of Apple’s new head of retailing and reactions to Google’s new shared endorsements.
abstract: Tuesday’s highlights from around the Web include a 2010 profile of Apple’s new head of retailing and reactions to Google’s new shared endorsements.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Angela Ahrendts Earns Her Stripes, and Eric Schmidt's Face on Google Ads
